description: CMake policy error CMP0004: Policy OLD behavior is no longer supported. Update CMake configuration to use NEW behavior.
CMake version incompatibility: Missing cmake_minimum_required command and outdated VERSION argument (<3.5). Update CMakeLists.txt syntax.
CMake configuration failure: Outdated cmake_minimum_required VERSION argument. Requires update to >=3.5 in CMakeLists.txt.
CMake syntax error: Invalid cmake_minimum_required specification. Update to use compatible version syntax (>=3.5).
CMake compatibility error: cmake_minimum_required lacks valid version specification. Requires VERSION >=3.5.
Type mismatch in logging.c: Returning NULL in int-returning functions. Additional warnings about misleading indentation.
Missing ctype.h includes causing implicit tolower/toupper declarations. Unchecked return values of write() calls.
Permission denied during %check phase: systemd-analyze failed to create /run/systemd/ directory.
Missing google/protobuf/descriptor.proto during Protobuf code generation. Dependency resolution failure.
Undefined reference to mtx::events::msg::to_json during linking. Missing implementation or library dependencies.
